Episodes

Home Characters Episodes

Episodes

S1.E1 ∙ Chapter 1: The Old Grist Mill

Lost in the mysterious woods of the Unknown, two brothers named Wirt and Gregory run into a jaded old woodsman who warns them to beware of a beast.

S1.E2 ∙ Chapter 2: Hard Times at the Huskin' Bee

Wirt refuses a bluebird's help and winds up wandering into a huge mess of trouble at the annual Pottsfield harvest festival.

S1.E3 ∙ Chapter 3: Schooltown Follies

Wirt, Greg, and Beatrice get all mixed up in the musical antics of a schoolhouse of animals, a lovelorn teacher, a grouchy old benefactor and an escaped gorilla.

S1.E4 ∙ Chapter 4: Songs of the Dark Lantern

Beatrice is left out in the rain with a brainless horse while Wirt and Greg must ask for directions in a lively colonial tavern called "The Dark Lantern."

S1.E5 ∙ Chapter 5: Mad Love

Quincy Endicott's sprawling mansion may be haunted by a beautiful ghost and Wirt and Beatrice get trapped in an armoire while searching for loose change.

S1.E6 ∙ Chapter 6: Lullaby in Frogland

Wirt and Greg go on a lighthearted romp aboard the Frogland Ferry as they approach Adelaide of the Pasture.

S1.E7 ∙ Chapter 7: The Ringing of the Bell

Wirt meets Lorna, a young woman forced to do housework by an odious witch with a magic bell.

S1.E8 ∙ Chapter 8: Babes in the Woods

While Wirt and Greg lay down to rest, they're drawn into a dreamworld of cherubs, flowers, and clouds.

S1.E9 ∙ Chapter 9: Into the Unknown

The origin of Wirt and Greg's descent into the Unknown reveals itself.

S1.E10 ∙ Chapter 10: The Unknown

The Beast has come. The final chapter begins.
